ygData.subject: Re: Root spell
ygData.msgSnippet: The best way to practice alteration is to use Fade whenever you are bored... It costs a lot less to use than root, it s not dangerous if it fails, and it s
ygData.messageBody:
The best way to practice alteration is to use Fade whenever you are bored...
It costs a lot less to use than root, it's not dangerous if it fails, and
it's quite abit more fun to just use and use and see where you end up. If
you are camped somewhere waiting your turn, try useing a whole vial mana
doing it ... you may be suprised at how fast it goes up.

Adia
A wizard of Tal`kor, in the land of Fennin Ro

>>I recently purchased the root spell and tried it out on an easy target, a
>>large rat, to see how well it would work. I'm currently level 7. The spell
>>hardly ever works for me. Will it be more effective the more you cast it?
I
>>can't see trying to use it on higher level creatures to gain xp if I can't
>>even root a large rat.
>>
